# Behavioral Analysis from Video (BehAV) Project

Welcome to the web site for for the BehAV project.
We are researchers who are building tools for using computer vision techniques to analyze videos of human and non-human animal behavior.
The project is based at Penn State, but involves researchers from New York University and elsewhere.
